thread.title: On the Air

title: On the Air
text:
Published October 24. 2015 12:01AM 
Auto Racing 
10:30 a.m., FS1 — NASCAR Truck Fred's 250 qualifying from Talladega, Ala. 
12:30 p.m., Ch. 61 — NASCAR Truck Fred's 250 from Talladega, Ala. 
12:30 p.m., NBCSN — Formula One U.S. Grand Prix qualifying from Austin, Texas. 
4 p.m., NBCSN — NASCAR Sprint Cup Geico 500 qualifying from Talladega, Ala. 
Baseball 
8 p.m., FS1 — ALCS: Toronto Blue Jays at Kansas City Royals in Game 7 (if necessary). 
Figure Skating 
5 p.m., Chs. 10, 30 — Skate America from Milwaukee.
